CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 4, 1964, pg. 5 reads: "Health Discussion - Harry Ball (left) chief X-ray technician at Mercy Hospital, discusses plans for the Health-O-Rama with Sylvia Vargo, Susan Carroll, Linda McCutcheon and Susan Sherwin. X-ray technicians from the Pennsylvania Society of X-Ray Technicians, District No. 1; Mercy Hospital, Magee Hospital and other area hospitals will volunteer for the four-day Health-O-Rama, which will be held at Savoy Ballroom, 2009 Centre. Ave. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Chief X-ray technician Harry Ball, and nurses Sylvia Vargo, Susan Carroll, Linda McCutcheon, and Susan Sherwin, in Mercy Hospital, vertical format
